text: Poland competed at the 1976 Winter Paralympics in Ornskoldsvik, Sweden. == Alpine skiing == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="4"|Final |- !Run !Rank |- |rowspan=1|Stanisław Bednarz |Giant slalom III |align="center"| 3:36.93 |align="center"|12 |- |rowspan=1|Ryszard Suder |Slalom III |align="center"|1:36.39 |align="center"|8 |- |rowspan=1|Franciszek Tracz |Slalom IVA |align="center"|2:24.38 |align="center"|6 |- |rowspan=1|Tadeusz Zajączkowski |Slalom II |align="center"|3:34.97 |align="center"|15 |- |} == Cross‑country skiing == {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Final |- !Finish Time !Rank |- |rowspan=2|Tadeusz Chwiejczak |rowspan=1|Standing 5 km Classic III |align="center"|20:56.0 |align="center"|DQ |- |rowspan=1|Standing 10 km Free III |align="center"|0:45:27.0 |align="center"|6 |- |rowspan=1|Zdzisław Olszewski |rowspan=1|Standing 5 km Classic II |align="center"|33:44.0 |align="center"|17 |- |rowspan=1|Aleksander Popławski |rowspan=1|Standing 5 km Classic I |align="center"|38:44.0 |align="center"|9 |- |rowspan=1|Tadeusz Zajączkowski |rowspan=1|Standing 5 km Classic II |align="center"|30:53.0 |align="center"|16 |- |rowspan=1|Zdzisław Olszewski Aleksander Popławski Tadeusz Zajączkowski |rowspan=1|3 x 5 km Relay Standing I-II |align="center"|1:19:35.0 |align="center"|5 |- |} == See also == * Poland at the Paralympics * Poland at the 1976 Winter Olympics == References == 1976 Category:1976 in Polish sport Category:Nations at the 1976 Winter Paralympics
